content: **crocheted sweater in muskat ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** 6/7 - 8/10 - 12/14 years finished measurements 77 - 91 - 91 cm 30 25 - 35-7/8 - 35-7/8 **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio 350-400-400 g color no 19 light gray drops 3 mm us c crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 16 sts pattern = 1 repeat = 7 cm 2 75 10 cm 4 = 23 sts of the pattern
